about_the_game:
From the Creators of "Demon King’s End" comes their latest masterpiece! A gunslinger with magic at your fingertips!

After years of hard work, the young mage finally saved up enough to build a beautiful house deep in the woods. But what she didn’t realize was that her new home was right next to a rift between the Shadow Realm and the Mortal Realm…

As night falls, monstrous shadowspawn creatures pour through the rift, destroying everything in their path. Armed with her Arcane Rifle, the mage is ready to pull the trigger and unleash a storm of fury on these rude invaders!

Mix & Match for Max Damage!

Think twice before pulling the trigger! Repositioning your bullets to create the ultimate buff combo!

Craft New Bullets!

Click the winged hammer to craft powerful new bullets with unique boosts!

Authentic Roguelike Vibe!

At the end of each round, pick the perfect perk based on your build!

Game Features

  • Meet the Mage’s Allies: Alongside the mage, her trusty friends are ready to join the fight. The Grand Sorcerer, the Judge, the Adventurer, and the Shaman are all here to back you up!

  • Choose from different types of magical bullets and powerful Arcane firearms to lay down some serious firepower!

  • Forge new bullets during combat, activate a variety of rune effects, and chain them together for devastating combos.

  • As the game progresses, the monsters grow stronger and each night brings new dangers to face. Expect a wide range of magical creatures that can either aid you in battle… or increase the danger you face!
